author: cstamas
msg: It is really not a specific part of indexer, and most probably only IDEs and such things will use the NexusArchetypeDataSource. But then, just provide archetype-common on classpath, and you are done! ;)

author: bentmann
msg: [MNG-4883] [regression] Dependency resolution does not fail for artifact with over-constrained version ranges

author: jleroux
msg: This to prevent issues and set layer as default if someone calls ConstructLookup directly (ie not by using a widget form lookup or using <@htmlTemplate.lookupField in a ftl template. This should not be but I crossed an issue due to this kind of thing in a custom app...). Can't hurt anyway...
